title: Add Momentum logo static asset and render in header + login screen

requirements.summary: Store Momentum.png as a frontend static asset under frontend/public so it loads instantly and can be referenced via a stable UI path.
acceptanceCriteria: The Momentum logo is stored as a frontend static file under frontend/public (or a subfolder such as frontend/public/assets/...)
The logo is served by the frontend at a stable URL path and does not require any backend call to load

file_operations.description: Add the uploaded Momentum logo as a static public asset so the UI can reference it via a stable path (e.g., /assets/Momentum.png) with no backend fetch.

requirements.summary: Update the global header to display the Momentum logo from the new static asset without distortion across screen sizes.
acceptanceCriteria: The global header shows the Momentum logo on all authenticated screens where the header is used
The logo uses object-fit styling (or equivalent) so it does not appear distorted
The logo path in Header.tsx points to the new stored Momentum logo asset (not a placeholder/old filename)

file_operations.description: Replace the current header logo image source with the new static asset path (/assets/Momentum.png) and adjust sizing classes to remain responsive and undistorted (use object-fit/object-contain; avoid cropping).

requirements.summary: Update the unauthenticated/login screen to show the Momentum logo centered at a large, high-quality size without distortion and without overflowing the card layout.
acceptanceCriteria: The login/unauthenticated screen displays the Momentum logo above the login button
The logo is displayed without distortion and at a large, high-quality size (not forced into a small fixed square like an icon)
The layout remains responsive on mobile and desktop (logo does not overflow the card or cause horizontal scrolling)

file_operations.description: Update the logo rendering to use the new static asset path (/assets/Momentum.png) and revise layout/styles so the image is centered and shown large (prefer natural aspect ratio with object-contain and responsive max dimensions) while staying within the shadcn-ui Card layout. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
